channel.title: Bayesian on Nadhir Hassen
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian on Nadhir Hassen

item.title: Deep Reinforcement Learning-WindFarm
item.description: Reinforcement learning is known to be unstable or even to diverge when a nonlinear function approximator such as a neural network is used to represent the action-value known as Q function.

item.title: Stochastic differential equations: Application to epidemiology
item.description: A SIR model is an epidemiological model that calculates the theoretical number of people infected with a contagious disease in a closed population over time.
